content: ophrys verily knits by claire slade ophrys is a sweet little lace cowl that knits up super quick and is perfect for your favourite sportweight yarn see the pattern notes on the following page for how to customise the height and circumference of your cowl gauge is not critical but will affect both finished measurements and yardage gauge 20sts x 32 row = 4 / 10cm in lace pattern blocked/ materials 170yds / 155m sportweight yarn 3 75mm / us5 16 / 40cm circular needle sample shown in knit picks high desert sport shade mountain bluebird finished measurements 24 circumference x 8 tall 61 x 20cm protectedunderukcopyright2022 allrightsreserved patternforpersonaluseonly contact contact@verilyknits com ophrys 1 pattern notes abbreviations to increase the height of the cowl continue to k knit repeat the 8 rounds of the lace pattern as many p purl times as desired for every additional repeat the round round height will increase by 1 / 2 5cm repeat repeat co cast on to increase the circumference of the cowl cast on additional stitches in multiples of 10 for every bobble bind off additional 10sts cast on the circumference will k2tog knit 2sts together increase by 2 / 5cm ssk slip 1 st slip 1 st knit the 2sts together yo yarnover s2kp slip 2sts k1 pass slipped sts over instructions upperedge co120stsandjointoworkintherndbeing carefulnottotwist rnd1 purl loweredge rnd2 knit
